title: Completed a mission I didn't intend to do
body: Awhile back I was spamming Zoe in poro king and while doing so was unknowingly completing the entire "Be Nice" mission and received the reindeer poro icon. The problem with this is id much rather have the baron poro icon. Please accept my poro art as an offering to change my reindeer poro icon to baron poro also I am way over the play 1,000 games play with a rioter :)

replies.body: I'm not sure if we'll be able to get those reset or not since you've already completed *all* of the mission in that line, but go ahead and write in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) really quick to see what can be done!

Hello, I also mistakenly completed the wrong mission, getting a baron poro instead of the reindeer poro I really wanted (and still kinda devastated bc of it).
Howeverrr...this all happened on my account in the PH server (Garena). Is it still possible to have it reset...? ;__;
